Pre-Game Insights: The Washington Wizards face the Miami Heat in Mexico City.
The Heat are favored by 7 points, and the over/under is 226.5.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played in Mexico City on Saturday at 9:30 p.m. EDT.
The Wizards allowed opponents to score 123.0 points per game and shoot 49.6% from the field last season.
The Heat allowed opponents to score 108.4 points per game and shoot 46.7% from the field last season.
Others: The Washington Wizards finished 15-67 overall, 4-12 in Southeast Division action and 7-34 at home a season ago.
The Miami Heat finished 46-36 overall and 13-3 in Southeast Division action during the 2023-24 season.
The Wizards have several injured players: Saddiq Bey (knee), Malcolm Brogdon (thumb), and Kyle Kuzma (groin).
The Heat have several injured players: Duncan Robinson (personal), Kevin Love (personal), and Josh Richardson (day to day, calf).
